participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for the arts and a deep connection to nature.
participant_1.background: I was adopted at a young age to an older couple. I'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. My father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. I enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.

participant_2.name: Rahul
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, with a love for sports and a strong sense of family values.
participant_2.background: I'm a swim coach at my local pool. My family and I are from India. I'm studying to be a computer programmer. My mother is very traditional while I prefer to be more free spirited.

content.text:
Hey! ðŸ‘‹ 
Tell me about yourself!
Hey! I am a swim coach at my local pool! And yourself?
I am a bit chilly and i love to go to the gym
Thatâ€™s great! I am from India and you?
I am from india. I have never been there.
Love it. I like to go to the beach and play some music.
I love music too! What do you listen to?
I like to listen to music while i am not working out.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds, but i am not good at it. I like to listen to music.
I love to sing. I am a singer.
I love singing in the choir. I am a very experienced singer.
I am glad you are not that good.
